item.title: Alyssa add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "It may be unfair, but what happens in a few days, sometimes even a single day, can change the course of a whole lifetime..." -- Khaled Hosseini

item.title: Alyssa add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "You don't love someone because they're perfect, you love them in spite of the fact that they're not." -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Alyssa add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "See, as much as you want to hold on to the bitter sore memory that someone has left this world, you are still in it" -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Alyssa add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "If you gave someone your heart and they died, did they take it with them? Did you spend the rest of forever with a hole inside you that couldn't be filled?" -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Alyssa add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "There's always going to be bad stuff out there. But here's the amazing thing -- light trumps darkness, every time. You stick a candle into the dark, but you can't stick the dark into the light." -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Alyssa add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It is our choices, Harry, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Alyssa add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It takes a great deal of bravery to stand up to our enemies, but just as much to stand up to our friends." -- J.K. Rowling
